alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:50PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pierce, southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware, southeastern Bacon and north central Clinch Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1150 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manor, or near Argyle, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Patterson, Argyle, Offerman, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Bristol, Cogdell and Dixie Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for southeastern Georgia.
